Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: Represents the session to use for the dialog. May be nil, which uses the active session if present, or returns NO, if not.

Parameter.Name: dialog
Parameter.Abstract: Represents the dialog or method name, such as @"feed"

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of parameters to be passed to the dialog

Parameter.Name: handler
Parameter.Abstract: An optional handler that will be called when the dialog is dismissed. Note, that if the method returns NO, the handler is not called. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: An optional delegate to allow for advanced processing of web based dialogs. See 'FBWebDialogsDelegate' for more details.

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: Represents the session to use for the dialog. May be nil, which uses the active session if present.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: The required message for the dialog.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: An optional title for the dialog.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of additional parameters to be passed to the dialog. May be nil

Parameter.Name: handler
Parameter.Abstract: An optional handler that will be called when the dialog is dismissed. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: friendCache
Parameter.Abstract: An optional cache object used to enable frictionless sharing for a known set of friends. The cache instance should be preserved for the life of the session and reused for multiple calls to the present method. As the users set of friends enabled for frictionless sharing changes, this method auto-updates the cache.
